Reviews.Title: Could Not Complete Installation of software
Reviews.Author: Dwight L. Pelton
Reviews.Content: Software install failed. Web site was no help.  Phone calls unanswered.  I am not a novice at installing software but I could not make this one work.  Amazon was great with return product process.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: A
Reviews.Content: I wish everyone can go buy the Camera, I am a peasant, and if a peasant can set up the camera in less than 2 hours. I know you all could, Please go ahead and buy the product.

ProductInfo.Features:
8 Channel Full 960H Surveillance DVR
Includes Pre-installed 1 TB Hard Drive
Connect up to 8 Cameras
Stream Live Video Directly to a remote MAC/PC/iPhone/iPad/Android. Receive email alerts upon motion detection
Receive email alerts upon motion detection
ProductInfo.Name: Q-See QT5682-1 8 Channel 960H Smart Recording DVR with Pre-Installed 1TB Hard Drive (Gray)
